valueContactDetail.name: HL7 US Realm Program Management Author

name: MedicationDrugClassForAllergenIntoleranceSCT
title: Medication drug class for allergen intolerance SCT
publisher: HL7 US Realm Program Management Steward
description: This value set should be used to document a patient reactant by searching in the following order: Drug Ingredient, Drug Class, then Other Substance. If a match is found, do not substitute with an alternative concept. Use SNOMED CTâ€™s Drug Product hierarchy when possible, or the Substance hierarchy if no product match exists. This approach leverages NLM mappings between SNOMED CT drug products and RxNorm ingredients traceable to orderable drugs. Note: this is not a comprehensive list of drug classes and does not include vaccines.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Pharmacologic classification concepts drawn from SNOMED CT that are used to group products that have the characteristic represented by the class. Primarily used for allergen and intolerance substance classes preferentially with the product hierarchy.),(Data Element Scope: Medication drug class),(Inclusion Criteria: SNOMED CT drug class concepts that represent the most common recorded allergy or intolerance drug classes. Concept drawn from the product hierarchy (where available) to enable use of RxClass linkage to RxNorm prescribable products.),(Exclusion Criteria: Drug class concepts outside the product hierarchy when a concept exists in product hierarchy)
